text: kmean kar bangkhitabangkham laey nowknong sasanea ei o sla m . pit brakd nasa karpit ban bangheanh chbasa pi brakear min pit . hetonih anaknea del kmean chomnue leu t hkou t te mean chomnue leu a l laoh noh ke brakadchea ban brakean khchab nouv khsae da rungmea( sasanea ai sla m)daoy min ach katphdach ban laey . haey a l laoh mha lyy mha doeng
